---
category: news
title: "ERC Proof of Concept: Artificial intelligence for flexible robots"
excerpt: "Professor Jan Peters has been awarded a ''Proof of Concept'' grant of 150,000 euros by the European Research Council (ERC). He receives the award for his project ''AssemblySkills''. The aim of the project is to give robots the ability to learn autonomously with the help of artificial intelligence."
publishedDateTime: 2020-07-28T14:59:00Z
